Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Balia bakhaya mana nibekalila khunjila ya Nyasaye, khulibametela eshinyasio hekulu weshinyasio shingala abeene bakholanga amabii

Ne inyanga yakhulirusia buli mumukanda omuloli mana ababoolele akarulana ninabo, ne wesi khukhurere obe omuloli khubo. Ne khwakhwishilia eshitabu shino eshiboolanga buli eshindu, nashio ni obulunjifu nende tsimbabaasi, nende obusangali khubalia abehotselesinjia (khu Nyasaye)
Toto Nyasaye alomesinjia okhukhola obuleengâ€™afu, nende okhukhola obulayi, nende okhuhelesia abeekho, ne akania eshifwolo nende okhukhola tsimbi. Abebaalilanga mwakhaba murio mwanyoola okhumanya

Ne mukhole shingala mulakananga nimwikhonyele elira lia Nyasaye, ne mulafunaka indakano yenyu tawe, nimumalile okhusuubisania, ne nimumalile okhukhola Nyasaye okhuba omuloli wenyu. Toto Nyasaye amanyile kamukholanga

Ne mulaba shinga Omukhasi ulia owateta olusi lulwe ebitonye ebitonye, nilumalilenje okhuba oluumu. Mukholanga ebitsubo bienyu munjila yokhukatania hakari wenyu. Khulwa okhuba mbu omukanda kwa Abandu okhuba nende amani okhushila omukanda kwa Abandu bandi. Toto Nyasaye abatemanga munjila eyo. Ne toto alibaboolela inyanga yeyindukho akamwawukhanilanga
Ne Nyasaye yenyanga yakhabakholele okhuba omukanda mulala butswa. halali alekhanga owayenya okhukora akore, ne alunjisinjia owayenya. Ne toto mulirebwa khukalia koosi kamwakholanga
